sub_topic: Identifying the perfect matching in a graph.
message_1: Consider an undirected graph G with 8 vertices and 12 edges. Determine if a perfect matching exists in G, and if so, list the edges that form a perfect matching in G.
message_2:
To determine if a perfect matching exists in G, we need to check if the graph satisfies the Tutte-Berge formula. The Tutte-Berge formula states that a graph G has a perfect matching if and only if:
